snippet.title: Lunistice - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Lunistice is a 3D Platformer created with simple but fun gameplay and a cute PS1/SEGA Saturn inspired artstyle in mind. Take the role of Hana the Tanuki and jump and fight through her dreams! What secrets await her on the moon - her final destination? 

Lunistice will launch on Steam, GOG and Nintendo Switch on September 2nd, 2022.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AGrumpyFox
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/YfXtjAR
________________________
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1701800/Lunistice/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/lunistice
Nintendo eShop: Coming Soon
